description: Comprehensive user profile view combining PnL, strategy signals, market exposure, and liquidity quality

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(DISTINCT trade_uid) AS total_trades
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'

SELECT sum(size * price) AS total_volume
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'

SELECT count(DISTINCT resolved_condition_id) AS markets
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND resolved_condition_id != ''

SELECT dateDiff('day', min(ts), max(ts)) AS active_days
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'

SELECT
  countIf(length(t.market_slug) > 0) * 100.0 / count() AS mapping_pct
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'

WITH latest AS (
  SELECT max(bucket_start) AS b
  FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet' AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
)
SELECT argMax(realized_pnl, computed_at) AS realized_pnl
FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  AND bucket_start = (SELECT b FROM latest)

SELECT argMax(pricing_confidence, computed_at) AS confidence
FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  AND bucket_start = (
    SELECT max(bucket_start)
    FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
    WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet' AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  )

SELECT argMax(pricing_snapshot_ratio, computed_at) * 100 AS snapshot_pct
FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  AND bucket_start = (
    SELECT max(bucket_start)
    FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
    WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet' AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  )

SELECT
  bucket_start AS time,
  argMax(realized_pnl, computed_at) AS "Realized PnL",
  argMax(mtm_pnl_estimate, computed_at) AS "MTM Estimate"
FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
GROUP BY bucket_start
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  bucket_start AS time,
  argMax(exposure_notional_estimate, computed_at) AS "Exposure"
FROM polyttool.user_pnl_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
GROUP BY bucket_start
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  t.ts AS time,
  coalesce(nullIf(t.question, ''), nullIf(t.market_slug, ''), t.resolved_condition_id, t.condition_id) AS market,
  coalesce(nullIf(t.resolved_outcome_name, ''), t.outcome) AS outcome,
  t.side AS side,
  t.price AS price,
  t.size AS size,
  t.size * t.price AS notional,
  if(t.transaction_hash != '', concat(left(t.transaction_hash, 10), 'â€¦'), '') AS tx_hash
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND $__timeFilter(t.ts)
ORDER BY t.ts DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  coalesce(nullIf(t.question, ''), nullIf(t.market_slug, ''), t.resolved_condition_id, t.condition_id) AS market,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS notional,
  count() AS trades
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND $__timeFilter(t.ts)
GROUP BY market
ORDER BY notional DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  coalesce(nullIf(t.resolved_outcome_name, ''), t.outcome, 'Unknown') AS outcome,
  coalesce(nullIf(t.question, ''), nullIf(t.market_slug, ''), t.resolved_condition_id, 'Unknown Market') AS market,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS notional,
  count() AS trades
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND $__timeFilter(t.ts)
GROUP BY outcome, market
ORDER BY notional DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH totals AS (
  SELECT sum(size * price) AS total_vol
  FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND $__timeFilter(ts)
)
SELECT
  if(t.category = '' OR t.category IS NULL, 'Unknown', t.category) AS category,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS notional,
  count() AS trades,
  sum(t.size * t.price) * 100.0 / (SELECT total_vol FROM totals) AS pct
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND $__timeFilter(t.ts)
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY notional DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH latest_bucket AS (
  SELECT max(bucket_start) AS b
  FROM polyttool.detector_results
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet' AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
)
SELECT
  multiIf(
    detector_name = 'HOLDING_STYLE', 'Holding Style',
    detector_name = 'DCA_LADDERING', 'DCA / Laddering',
    detector_name = 'MARKET_SELECTION_BIAS', 'Market Concentration',
    detector_name = 'COMPLETE_SET_ARBISH', 'Complete-Set Arb',
    detector_name
  ) AS "Strategy",
  argMax(score, computed_at) AS score,
  argMax(label, computed_at) AS "Signal",
  any(bucket_start) AS "As Of"
FROM polyttool.detector_results
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  AND bucket_start = (SELECT b FROM latest_bucket)
GROUP BY detector_name
ORDER BY detector_name

SELECT
  bucket_start AS time,
  multiIf(
    detector_name = 'HOLDING_STYLE', 'Holding Style',
    detector_name = 'DCA_LADDERING', 'DCA / Laddering',
    detector_name = 'MARKET_SELECTION_BIAS', 'Market Concentration',
    detector_name = 'COMPLETE_SET_ARBISH', 'Complete-Set Arb',
    detector_name
  ) AS detector,
  argMax(score, computed_at) AS score
FROM polyttool.detector_results
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
GROUP BY bucket_start, detector_name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  coalesce(t.category, 'Unmapped') AS category,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS volume
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY volume DESC
LIMIT 8

WITH totals AS (
  SELECT sum(size * price) AS total_vol
  FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
)
SELECT
  coalesce(t.category, 'Unmapped') AS category,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS volume,
  count(DISTINCT t.resolved_condition_id) AS markets,
  sum(t.size * t.price) * 100.0 / (SELECT total_vol FROM totals) AS pct
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY volume DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  coalesce(nullIf(t.question, ''), nullIf(t.market_slug, ''), t.resolved_condition_id, t.condition_id) AS market,
  sum(t.size * t.price) AS volume,
  count() AS trades
FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved t
WHERE t.proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
GROUP BY market
ORDER BY volume DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  countIf(status = 'ok') AS ok,
  countIf(status = 'no_orderbook') AS no_orderbook,
  countIf(status = 'empty') AS empty,
  countIf(status = 'one_sided') AS one_sided,
  countIf(status = 'error') AS error
FROM polyttool.token_orderbook_snapshots
WHERE $__timeFilter(snapshot_ts)

SELECT
  toStartOfDay(snapshot_ts) AS time,
  countIf(status = 'ok') * 100.0 / count() AS "OK Rate"
FROM polyttool.token_orderbook_snapshots
WHERE $__timeFilter(snapshot_ts)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT count(DISTINCT condition_id) AS arb_events
FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'

SELECT sum(fees) AS total_fees
FROM (
  SELECT argMax(total_fees_est_usdc, computed_at) AS fees
  FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  GROUP BY condition_id
)

SELECT sum(slippage) AS total_slippage
FROM (
  SELECT argMax(total_slippage_est_usdc, computed_at) AS slippage
  FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  GROUP BY condition_id
)

SELECT
  countIf(liquidity_confidence = 'high') * 100.0 / count() AS usable_rate
FROM (
  SELECT argMax(liquidity_confidence, computed_at) AS liquidity_confidence
  FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  GROUP BY condition_id
)

SELECT
  countIf(depth_100_ok = 1) * 100.0 / count() AS depth_100_rate
FROM (
  SELECT argMax(depth_100_ok, computed_at) AS depth_100_ok
  FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  GROUP BY condition_id
)

WITH user_tokens AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT resolved_token_id AS token_id
  FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT resolved_token_id AS token_id
  FROM polyttool.user_positions_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
)
SELECT
  if(
    countIf(e.status = 'ok') = 0,
    0,
    countIf(e.usable_liquidity = 1) * 100.0 / countIf(e.status = 'ok')
  ) AS usable_liquidity_rate
FROM polyttool.orderbook_snapshots_enriched e
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT token_id FROM user_tokens
) t ON e.resolved_token_id = t.token_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(e.snapshot_ts)

SELECT
  countIf(confidence = 'high') AS high,
  countIf(confidence = 'medium') AS medium,
  countIf(confidence = 'low') AS low
FROM (
  SELECT argMax(confidence, computed_at) AS confidence
  FROM polyttool.arb_feasibility_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  GROUP BY condition_id
)

WITH user_tokens AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT resolved_token_id AS token_id
  FROM polyttool.user_trades_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT resolved_token_id AS token_id
  FROM polyttool.user_positions_resolved
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
)
SELECT
  coalesce(nullIf(e.question, ''), nullIf(e.market_slug, ''), e.resolved_token_id) AS market,
  e.outcome_name,
  median(e.execution_cost_bps_100) AS median_exec_cost_bps,
  median(e.depth_bid_usd_50bps + e.depth_ask_usd_50bps) AS median_depth_total
FROM polyttool.orderbook_snapshots_enriched e
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT token_id FROM user_tokens
) t ON e.resolved_token_id = t.token_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(e.snapshot_ts)
  AND e.status = 'ok'
  AND e.liquidity_grade IN ('HIGH', 'MED')
GROUP BY market, e.outcome_name
ORDER BY median_exec_cost_bps ASC, median_depth_total DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH latest AS (
  SELECT max(bucket_start) AS bucket_start
  FROM polyttool.user_opportunities_bucket
  WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
    AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
)
SELECT
  coalesce(nullIf(question, ''), nullIf(market_slug, ''), token_id) AS market,
  outcome_name,
  execution_cost_bps_100,
  depth_bid_usd_50bps,
  depth_ask_usd_50bps,
  liquidity_grade,
  status,
  computed_at
FROM polyttool.user_opportunities_bucket
WHERE proxy_wallet = '$proxy_wallet'
  AND bucket_type = '$bucket_type'
  AND bucket_start = (SELECT bucket_start FROM latest)
ORDER BY execution_cost_bps_100 ASC,
         (depth_bid_usd_50bps + depth_ask_usd_50bps) DESC
LIMIT 25

title: PolyTool - User Overview
